sections.text: Rules, regulations, or amendments thereto shall be adopted pursuant to the Administrative Procedure Act.SourceLaws 1980,

81-1612.Rules and regulations.

The Director of Water, Energy, and Environment may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations for implementation and administration of sections 81-1608 to 81-1626. Rules, regulations, or amendments thereto shall be adopted pursuant to the Administrative Procedure Act.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 954, § 36;Laws 1981, LB 2, § 1;Laws 1983, LB 124, § 13;Laws 2000, LB 1135, § 27;Laws 2019, LB302, § 160;Laws 2025, LB317, § 454.Operative Date: July 1, 2025

Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.
